bodies.description:
{color: #FF9900}Trident Mobile Update Information:
{color}- Ghost Cards Implementation
- Removal of Unlocked Unit Changes
- Safety Measures have been inplemented
and improved

{color: #FF9900}What are Ghosts Cards?
{color}Ghost cards are units that will be added to
your box, however, only the player can see
and use these cards, while the game server will never see the ghost cards because
to the server, Ghost Cards do not exist,
hence the name Ghost Cards.
